Docs.summary: Defines a position of an in the event hub partition. The position can be one of , or .

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.EventPosition FromEnd() cil managed
Public Shared Function FromEnd () As EventPosition
static member FromEnd : unit -> Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.EventPosition

Docs.summary: Returns the position for the end of a stream. Provide this position in receiver creation to start receiving from the next available event in the partition after the receiver is created.
